pedtricks 0.3.1

Package index

All functions

convert_ped()
Converts a pedigree with individuals specified as factors to a numeric pedigree
draw_ped()
Produce a graphical representation of a pedigree
draw_pedA()
Produce a graphical representation of the relatedness matrix of a pedigree
fix_ped()
Manipulating pedigrees to prepare them for requirements of subsequent analyses Prepares a pedigree to conform with requirements of many softwares used in quantitative genetic analysis, as well as for many of the functions in pedantics.
genome_sim()
A function to simulate QTL and/or SNP data.
ggpedigree()
ggpedigree: Pedigree plotting tool for complex pedigrees.
gryphons
Example dataset for pedtricks examples and tutorial
micro_sim()
Simulates microsatellite data across a pedigree.
ped_stats()
Calculates a range of statistics of pedigrees
pedtricks pedtricks-package
pedtricks: Functions to Visualize, Summarize and Simulate Data from Pedigrees
phen_sim()
A function to simulated phenotypic data
plot(<ped_stats>)
Plot output from ped_stats
summary(<ped_stats>)
Post-processes output from ped_stats

Developed by Julien Martin, Matthew Wolak, Susan Johnston, Michael Morrissey.
